title: Samsung SL-M2870FW Mono Laser All-in-One Printer
description: All-in-One Functionality Being able to fax, scan, copy, and print from a single device makes this Samsung all-in-one laser printer an excellent choice for small or home offices where space is limited. Save money by only needing to maintain one piece of equipment, and handle all your business needs in one convenient location.
